title: 单人游戏怎么自定义武器攻击力
author: CXi_Chen
txt_content: RT，要用命令方块来自定义武器的攻击力。

replies.author: 爱心魔王FHC
replies.txt_content:
MC1.7：指令方块自定义装备属性教程
http://www.mcbbs.net/thread-209718-1-1.html
1.8可用

replies.author: 虫小哥
replies.txt_content: 有很多辅助软件 例如 命令工厂http://www.mcbbs.net/forum.php?m ... 1114&highlight=命令工厂

replies.author: CXi_Chen
replies.txt_content:
极其无聊 发表于 2016-10-30 15:45
有很多辅助软件 例如 命令工厂http://www.mcbbs.net/forum.php?mod=viewthread&tid=491114&highlight=命令 ...
单人1.8能用这个软件吗？

replies.author: 虫小哥
replies.txt_content: 该软件帖内有说明  适用版本为 1.8.X

replies.author: 博中
replies.txt_content:
直接获得1000点伤害的木剑
/give @a wooden_sword 1 0 {Unbreakable:1b,AttributeModifiers:[{Operation:0,UUIDLeast:1,UUIDMost:1,Amount:20,AttributeName:generic.maxHealth,Name:a},{Operation:0,UUIDLeast:1,UUIDMost:1,Amount:1000,AttributeName:generic.attackDamage,Name:b}]}

replies.author: CXi_Chen
replies.txt_content:
博中 发表于 2016-10-30 16:33
直接获得1000点伤害的木剑
/give @a wooden_sword 1 0 {Unbreakable:1b,AttributeModifiers:[{Operation:0, ...
那如果是钻石剑怎么弄？

replies.author: 爱心魔王FHC
replies.txt_content:
